author: Emma Elsworthy, Emma Elsworthy
title: Coronavirus: More than two million risk spreading disease by leaving home to top up on energy
description: 'My clear and direct message is that no-one should leave the house during the Covid-19 emergency to top-up their energy meters,' says CEO of energy company
content:
Millions of Brits are continuing to put themselves and others at risk during the Covid-19 pandemic by leaving their home to top up on energy.
Despite 4.3 million UK households having signed up for prepaid gas and electricity, almost half of those with smart … [+1581 chars]
